author: Staff Reporter
text:
The rural police on Tuesday evening arrested a 32-year-old man on charges of kidnapping a minor girl and sexually assaulting her.

Koteswaran of Edappadi lured the girl with marriage and took her to Erode and sexually assaulted her. Based on a complaint, the Tharamangalam police registered a case under Section 366A (procuration of minor girl).

On Tuesday, they returned to their native. Her parents informed the police.

The section was altered as 3 r/w 4 of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012. Koteswaran was arrested and lodged at Salem Central Prison. examination was done on the girl.

Arrested

In Namakkal, a 35-year-old man of Kolli Hills was arrested by the police for possessing country-made gun without licence. Valavandi Nadu police on patrol intercepted a farmer Murugesan, who was in possession of the gun. He was arrested and the gun seized.
title: Man held for sexual assault
